Module io.github.jonloucks.concurrency.api
Package io.github.jonloucks.concurrency.api

Interface Waitable<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of references
All Superinterfaces:
Consumer<T>, Supplier<T>, WaitableConsumer<T>, WaitableNotify<T>, WaitableSupplier<T>
public interface Waitable<T> extends WaitableSupplier<T>, WaitableConsumer<T>, WaitableNotify<T>
Provides mutable reference that allows other threads to wait until the value satisfies a given condition.

  • Method Details

    • waitFor

      @Deprecated default Optional<T> waitFor(Predicate<T> predicate)
      Deprecated.
      Replaced by WaitableSupplier.getWhen(Predicate)
      Waits until condition is satisfied for a value to match the predicate
      Parameters:
      predicate - the predicate to test if the value satisfies the stop waiting condition
      Returns:
      optionally the value if
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if predicate is null

    • waitFor

      @Deprecated default Optional<T> waitFor(Predicate<T> predicate, Duration timeout)
      Deprecated.
      Replaced by WaitableSupplier.getWhen(Predicate, Duration)
      Waits for given timeout for a value to match the predicate
      Parameters:
      predicate - the predicate to test if the value satisfies the stop waiting condition
      timeout - the time to wait for the value to satisfy the predicate
      Returns:
      optionally the value if
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if predicate is null, duration is null, or duration is negative

    • shutdown

      void shutdown()
      Aborts all waiting threads. All subsequent wait related calls will return immediately. Shutdown is permanent
